Most docs these days will work with a diabetic educator that help with some of your concerns as part of the overall care of the disease.  I would ask your treating physician if they are involved with any such program/person and how you could begin ustilizing their services.  They typically work a lot on nutrition/diet among other lifestyle issues.  good luck
